attributes.action: Change the laws for Drink Driving offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see The drink driving laws changed to ZERO TOLERANCE. With harsher penalties enforced to offenders. If a drink driving offender causes death, we would like to see this changed from "Causing death by Dangerous driving" to Manslaughter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
